title: See the world in a whole new way with these night vision digital binoculars, now under $100
content:
Macworld

Enjoy spending time outdoors? Whether you’re into camping, hunting, fishing, or simply enjoy a casual hike, you want to see all the wonders nature offers. And for that, these ultra-portable digital night vision binoculars can help.

They’re now price-dropped to only $99.99 (reg. $159) for a limited time. You can grab one for yourself or gift it to another outdoor explorer this holiday season.

Unlike the clunky, burdensome binoculars of the past, these hi-tech binoculars harness the power of 21st-century optics to provide even better performance in a more compact package. Observe nature during the day or night up to 300 meters away, and enjoy these binoculars’ night vision power, 10X optical magnification, and 4X digital zoom.

It even comes with a 2.4-inch HD screen for users to take photos and record with 1080p HD and an 850nm infrared illuminator, enabling you to see flora and fauna clearly, even in 100% dark or dim ambient light. Another bonus? These night vision binoculars are small enough to comfortably stow away in a pocket, bag, or backpack without sacrificing power. 

Gift yourself or a fellow nature lover these innovative binoculars.

Get the Mini Dual Tube Digital Night Vision Binoculars with 1080p HD Recording for just $99.99 while supplies last. No coupon required!
